mapper.sql: SELECT FREE_BOARD.FREE_BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, FREE_BOARD.CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, IMAGE_PATH,
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FREE_BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = FREE_BOARD.MEMBER_NO WHERE FREE_BOARD.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND PLATFORM_NO = #{categoryNo}
AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

MEMBER.NICKNAME AS "NICKNAME", COUNT, PLATFORM_NAME, NVL(RCOUNT, 0) AS "REVIEW_COUNT" FROM FREE_BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = FREE_BOARD.MEMBER_NO JOIN PLATFORM_CATEGORY ON PLATFORM_CATEGORY.PLATFORM_NO = FREE_BOARD.PLATFORM_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT FREE_BOARD_NO, COUNT(FREE_BOARD_NO) AS "RCOUNT" FROM FREE_BOARD_REVIEW WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY FREE_BOARD_NO) R ON FREE_BOARD.FREE_BOARD_NO = R.FREE_BOARD_NO WHERE FREE_BOARD.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND FREE_BOARD.PLATFORM_NO = #{categoryNo}
AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY FREE_BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD ( FREE_BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, PLATFORM_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, IMAGE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FREE_BOARD.nextval, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{memberNo}, #{platformNo}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{imagePath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE FREE_BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: MEMBER.MEMBER_NO AS "MEMBER_NO", MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME AS "MEMBER_NAME", MEMBER.NICKNAME AS "NICKNAME", COUNT, PLATFORM_CATEGORY.PLATFORM_NO, PLATFORM_NAME, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEWCREATEDATE, REVIEWWRITER, REVIEW_NO FROM FREE_BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = FREE_BOARD.MEMBER_NO JOIN PLATFORM_CATEGORY ON PLATFORM_CATEGORY.PLATFORM_NO = FREE_BOARD.PLATFORM_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT REVIEW_NO, FREE_BOARD_NO, REVIEW_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE AS "REVIEWCREATEDATE", MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME AS "REVIEWWRITER" FROM FREE_BOARD_REVIEW JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = FREE_BOARD_REVIEW.MEMBER_NO WHERE FREE_BOARD_REVIEW.DELETE_YN = 'N') R ON FREE_BOARD.FREE_BOARD_NO = R.FREE_BOARD_NO WHERE FREE_BOARD.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND MEMBER.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND FREE_BOARD.FREE_BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

MEMBER.MEMBER_NO AS "MEMBER_NO", MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME AS "MEMBER_NAME", MEMBER.NICKNAME AS "NICKNAME", COUNT, PLATFORM_CATEGORY.PLATFORM_NO AS "PLATFORM_NO", PLATFORM_NAME FROM FREE_BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = FREE_BOARD.MEMBER_NO JOIN PLATFORM_CATEGORY ON PLATFORM_CATEGORY.PLATFORM_NO = FREE_BOARD.PLATFORM_NO WHERE FREE_BOARD.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND MEMBER.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND FREE_BOARD.FREE_BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD_REVIEW VALUES ( SEQ_FREE_BOARD_REVIEW.nextval, #{freeBoardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{reviewContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
